title: homebrew pull request error when version has special characters

content.raw:
A recent build failed since the `VERSION` parameter included a `~` character:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/15/console

~~~
+ BRANCH=sdformat4_4.0.0~pre1
+ git -C /mnt/ephemeral_1/jenkins/jobs/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/workspace/linuxbrew/Library/Taps/osrf/homebrew-simulation checkout -b sdformat4_4.0.0~pre1
fatal: 'sdformat4_4.0.0~pre1' is not a valid branch name.
~~~
content.html:
A recent build failed since the VERSION parameter included a ~ character:

  • http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/15/console
+ BRANCH=sdformat4_4.0.0~pre1
+ git -C /mnt/ephemeral_1/jenkins/jobs/generic-release-homebrew_pull_request_updater/workspace/linuxbrew/Library/Taps/osrf/homebrew-simulation checkout -b sdformat4_4.0.0~pre1
fatal: 'sdformat4_4.0.0~pre1' is not a valid branch name.
